column2: "Why the lack of enthusiasm, Tea? I'm extremely hyped up!"
"Why? Because I got my hands on some great information!"
"Want to hear it? No? Well too bad, I'm telling you anyway!"
"Not exactly an information business, but whatever."
"The location is here, Lillipa! Small shadows have been spotted around the place!"
"You might think your eyes are playing tricks on you, but there have been a lot of sightings!"
"There might be something to it. Plus, I just heard this!"
"That an ARKS member on the brink of death was saved by the shadows."
"And that ARKS member is looking to thank them, so she's looking high and low for the shadows!"
"I'm pretty sure it was some female cast, you might ask her about it directly."
